main event: On 2 Jan 58, at Tachikawa-Yokota AFB, Japan, four welding torch-like objects emitting white light were observed along with yellow objects moving in coordinated flight at approximately 30-40 mph.
interesting points: The objects were noted to flash on and off during observations., The objects appeared to have bright reddish-white coloration, with an estimated size of 50 ft long., The sighting lasted between 5-10 minutes., Witnesses reported seeing similarities with flying saucer phenomena., There were other sightings documented in the vicinity around the same time frame.
sighted object: four welding torch-like objects and yellow objects in coordinated flight
